meanings.definition: A group or set of six.
meanings.sent1: My family consists of a hexad of members.
meanings.sent2: The hexad of colors in the rainbow is beautiful.
meanings.sent3: At the party, we formed a hexad to play a game together.
meanings.sent4: The hexad of puppies frolicked in the yard.
meanings.sent5: Counting the hexad of eggs in the carton, I realized one was missing.

meanings.sent1: The playground had a hexad drawn on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The honeycomb is made up of hexads.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator accidentally made a hexad-shaped cake.
meanings.sent4: The soccer ball is a hexad when viewed from above.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's field was divided into hexads for planting different crops.
